summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs with AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics using MkDocs hooks. Key features include multiple AI service integrations, automatic summary generation, support for multiple languages, intelligent content cleaning, flexible configuration, and intelligent reading statistics. The system offers smart cache management, precise character counting, code detection, and configurable deployment options. Installation involves downloading files, setting up hooks, configuring AI services, and deploying on platforms like GitHub Pages. The project aims to make MkDocs documentation smarter and more efficient.
